data.text: @jkmcelveen @TheEconomist I wonder why many networks report the same story except for fox. Are you on denial?
@TheEconomist Until he is willing to accept responsibility for when things go bad he doesn't deserve a scrap of credit for when things go well.
@TheEconomist Yeah The US economy is just putting along, barely getting by.

@TheEconomist A Spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down 
The medicine go down-wown 
The medicine go down 
Just a spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down...
